Info.title: How to Install Node.js
Info.desc: How to install Node.js before setting up your project.

Instructions.instruction: Check if you already have node installed by running the following command in your terminal. It should print the version if it's installed.

Code.FormatCode:
service: flask-lambda-app

provider:
	name: aws
	runtime: python3.9
	region: us-east-1
	environment:
		DATABASE_URL: sqlite:///mydatabase.db

functions:
	app:
		handler: wsgi_handler.handler
		events:
			- http:
				path: /
				method: ANY
			- http:
				path: '{proxy+}'
				method: ANY


plugins:
	- serverless-python-requirements

custom:
	pythonRequirements:
		dockerizePip: true
